Introduction

Xiao dejun, known under his stage name Xiaojun, is a Chinese singer and is a main vocalist of NCT and its China-based subunit, WayV. Previously, he was a SM Entertainment trainee and was introduced as a member of SMROOKIES on July 17, 2018, until his debut with WayV on January 17, 2019.
